title: [HIGH] Yield Farming Optimization Engine
body:
## Vision Gap

VISION mentions passive income generation through yield farming - not implemented.

## Required Features

### Yield Discovery
- Fetch top yields from DefiLlama API
- Filter by TVL, APY, risk level
- Protocol reputation scoring

### Strategy Selection
- Conservative: Blue-chip stablecoins only
- Balanced: Mix of stable and volatile
- Aggressive: High APY with higher risk

### Automation
- Auto-enter promising farms
- Auto-exit declining farms
- Harvest and compound rewards
- Gas cost optimization
- IL protection thresholds

### Risk Management
- Maximum allocation per farm
- Protocol exposure limits
- Smart contract risk assessment
- Rug-pull detection

## Example Flow
1. K.I.T. discovers 15% APY on Curve stETH/ETH
2. Risk check: Lido + Curve = trusted protocols
3. Allocate $5000 (within limits)
4. Monitor daily, compound weekly
5. Alert if APY drops below 10%

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Discovers real yield opportunities
- [ ] Executes farming strategies
- [ ] Compounds rewards automatically
- [ ] Manages risk exposure

## Priority: HIGH
